directions.step:
* Use a blender or food processor for this recipe.
Put all ingredients in blender and turn to puree mode until of desired consistency. (Make only about 2 servings at one time so the blender will not be overfilled.) If using a food processor, use the steel knife to process; 8-10 seconds will be sufficient.
Serve in a tall glass. Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #209
